TopicTitle: Bad Ideas Corp Experimental Vehicle: "Most Unorthodox"-class OmniRover

Articles.Content:
'MOST UNORTHODOX'-class OmniRover

A new novelty craft from Bad Ideas Nuclear Weapons and Spacecraft Corporation

Messing around with the new cart plugin, and built this...err...thing

It can travel in any direction. The easiest way to 'launch' is to back off the launchpad.

It\'s very bouncy; applications in a thrust-less Munar landing have not been ruled out.

Do not try to turn it at high speeds. It has a 78.985% chance (based on a 10000-run trial series) of either flipping wildly and tearing itself apart OR spinning rapidly while not turning, and THEN tearing itself apart in a horribly violent way.

And now for some images.

In the VAB:

On the pad:

And on the move!

Haven\'t tried getting it to the Mun yet; I\'m not sure if it\'s even POSSIBLE.

Requires NovaSilisko\'s Probodobodyne and Tosh\'s Cart plugin

Craft file attached
